Cmon people... you do this the same way you do most of these apps.  FTFI.  Unrar it.  Don't put in any code during this.  After that, copy the exe file in crack folder over the original.  Open the app.  Click HELP then register program.  Put the code that scyrage gave.  It worked like a champ today.
